metadata.synopsis: Kobold Looter has burst out of the coffin looting, only to find a wildshaped animal (dangerous) that has disturbed her.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Dig up Kurwin's Coffin- Wildshape into anything not a cat/raven- Interact with/break the coffin

0.speaker: Bugthimble
0.text: What's the big - agh! Get back, you stupid beast!
0.context: NodeContext: Initially angry "What's the big idea?!" but then alarmed. Instead of the person you were going to shout at, there's a ferocious animal (eg. Bear).
